sobreTexto1: Hello! My name is Leonardo de Vasconcelos Gon√ßalves, I'm 21 years old and a Software Engineering student at UniRitter (expected graduation in 2026). Technology has always been a passion for me, especially developing systems and custom bots. Since 2019, I've been improving my programming skills and, since 2021, I've worked as a freelancer on the Workana platform, focusing on creating digital solutions for various clients.
sobreTexto2: I'm a committed, punctual person, flexible with schedules and passionate about challenges. I believe in constant learning and enjoy exploring new areas of technology. I also have hands-on experience with game development in Unity, APIs, and Discord bots.
projeto1desc: Development of a bot with multiple features using Python APIs. Team project focused on communication and problem-solving.
projeto2desc: Project developed with a colleague to practice game development in C#, working with logic, design, and simple mechanics.
habilidadesLinguagensDesc: Python, Java, C#, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, SQL, MySQL
habilidadesFerramentasDesc: React (basic), TypeScript (basic), Unity, Power BI (basic), Excel, Word, PowerPoint
sociaisComunicacaoDesc: Ability to convey ideas clearly and objectively.
sociaisEquipeDesc: Experience collaborating with different professional profiles.
sociaisProblemasDesc: Ability to analyze situations and find effective solutions.
